page.title: 11Diet and Eating Patterns
page.content: I looked at what most of the children in my class had to eat on a school day and the way in which they had their meals. {Breakfast}About half the class just had cereal and a drink. Cornflakes and tea was most common. One only had a drink of orange and one had Rice Crispies, bacon and egg and an orange drink. Only three others had bacon or egg as part of their meal. Well over half had breakfast on their own. Only four had a family meal at table. {Lunch }Six had the school lunch of roast lamb, roast potatoes,cabbage and gravy followed by trifle. The rest had sandwiches. This is a random example:- 3 chicken paste sandwiches, a packet of crisps(very popular), lemon squash. {Evening}Random example:- Chips, baked beans, sausage, coffee. Over a third ate at table with most of the family.
